main event: Multiple UFO sightings and incidents were reported in Maryland on 13th November 1957, including sightings of saucer-shaped objects and metallic globes hovering and disappearing at high speeds.
interesting points: Witnesses reported seeing saucer-shaped objects hovering and then disappearing at high speeds, leaving behind a dust cloud.
A metallic silvery globe, resembling a luminescent object, was observed hovering over the Montebello State Mental Hospital.
An unidentified object was observed disintegrating and shrinking to the size of a cigarette paper before disappearing.
The incident involved interactions between the military police, civilian security police, and other military authorities.
Photographs and specimen samples of the unidentified objects were reportedly collected and handed over for investigation.
witnesses: military personnel, civilian witnesses, Chief of Police, hospital employees
photographs: Partial information on photographs and specimen samples
